code: import{combineReducers}from'redux';import cart from'./cart/Reduces';import productList from'./productList/Reduces';import theme from'./theme/Reduces';var initialState={cart:JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem('cart'))||[],productList:'',theme:{theme:'grass',color:'green'}};export default combineReducers({cart:cart,productList:productList,theme:theme},initialState);
